title: Blizzard Working on Unannounced AAA RPG-FPS - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.30.24
description:
Head over to Kindafunny.com/DragonAge to listen and subscribe to Dragon Age: Vows & Vengeance!

Blizzard is working on an unannounced AAA RPG-FPS, why is Black Myth Wukong not on Xbox, and a whole lotta little Nintendo updates!

After, KFGD, you’ll get:
A Kinda Funny GAMESCAST where Nick gives his thoughts on Star Wars Outlaws
After that Nick is going to stream 
For KF Members, You can also get today’s Gregway
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Karl Jacobs & Delaney Twining

00:00:00 - Start
00:05:40 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:07:54 - Unannounced AAA RPG-FPS Title from Blizzard (Timur222 on Twitter, I saw via Knoebel, from Chris McCabe’s LinkedIn at Blizzard)
00:15:50 - The Legend of Zelda Echoes of Wisdom Trailer 
00:32:10 - Ad  
00:33:20 - Ouka Studios (Visions of Mana dev, released today) reportedly has all but a handful of jobs cut by NetEase. (Takashi Mochizuki at Bloomberg)
00:43:40 - The real reason why Black Myth: Wukong isn't on Xbox has been revealed (Derek Strickland at TweakTown)
00:54:01 - Banjo-Kazooie N64 has been decompiled, opening the door for PC ports (Chris Scullion at VGC)
01:01:01 - Wee News!
01:06:20 - You‘re Wrong
